body_html:
This is triggered here:
tf.train.export_meta_graph("model.ckpt.meta")

And here:
writer = tf.summary.FileWriter("/", sess.graph)

This holds if either is the first statement inside with tf.Session() as sess
body_text:
This is triggered here:
tf.train.export_meta_graph("model.ckpt.meta")
And here:
writer = tf.summary.FileWriter("/", sess.graph)
This holds if either is the first statement inside with tf.Session() as sess
body:
This is triggered here:
`tf.train.export_meta_graph("model.ckpt.meta")`

And here:
`writer = tf.summary.FileWriter("/", sess.graph)`

This holds if either is the first statement inside `with tf.Session() as sess`
